REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C L f0689 reute u f BC-SIOUX-CITY-HOGS-SEEN 04-07 0045

TEXT.TITLE: SIOUX CITY HOGS SEEN UP 0.50 DLR - PRIVATE
TEXT.BODY: Hog prices expected 0.50 dlr higher on estimated receipts of 3,200 head, private sources said. Top seen at 51.00 dlrs per cwt. Sources cited higher cut-out values late yesterday. Reuter
